title: What About Love?
description: A secret rendezvous, a quickie marriage, a love denied--secrets of the heart are hard to bear alone.By mutual agreement, rock star Brian Tristan and Lexy Claremont parted after a hot and heavy weekend neither would ever forget. Consenting to annul their marriage was a decision each regretted the moment they made it. So imagine their shock when they learn they are still married, a revelation made on the heels of an announcement Lexy never wanted to hear, one that has both of them asking, "What about love?" and discovering someone else had a secret agenda of their own by keeping them apart...
author: Caitlyn Willows
